Commands.Blizzard Combo: 5-HIT BRV attack.  Grants 1 stack of Sage and removes Ninja.  Sage raises Attack and Magical Attack based on the number of stacks (max stacks is 3).  Sage also raises all party members' Attack once it reaches 3 stacks.
Commands.Multi-Hit: 6-HIT BRV attack.  Grants 1 stack of Ninja and removes Sage.  Low Action Delay.  Ninja raises Speed and Physical Attack based on the number of stacks (max is 3).  Ninja also raises all party members' Attack once it reaches 3 stacks.
Commands.Blade Torrent: 6-HIT BRV+HP attack + 6-HIT BRV+HP attack with low Action Delay.  Grants 3 Ninja stacks (max).  Turns into Meteorite if Sage is active.
Commands.Meteorite: 6-HIT AoE BRV attack + single target HP attack.  BRV hits are dispersed if there is more than one enemy.  Grants 3 Sage stacks (max).  Turns into Blade Torrent if Ninja or no stance is active.

Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Blizzard Combo Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Blizzard Combo.
Passives.Sage's Knowledge: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned when gaining Sage stacks.
Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when using abilities continuously (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack).
Passives.Multi-Hit Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Multi-Hit.
Passives.Blizzard Combo Charge: Increases the max uses of Blizzard Combo by 1.
Passives.Multi-Hit Charge: Increases the max uses of Multi-Hit by 1.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self.
Passives.Ninja's Tactics: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns after dealing a critical hit while Ninja's Training is up.
Passives.Sage's Wisdom: Greatly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Speed while in Sage stance.
Passives.Blizzard Combo Extend: Increases the max uses of Blizzard Combo by 1.Tremendously raises its potency.Triggers an HP attack after use.While Sage I/II is active:- Turns BRV Attack to Blizzard.- Blizzard is a 1-HIT Ice-elemental magic BRV attack.While Sage II/III is active:- Deals 50% splash HP damage to other targets after using Blizzard Combo.While Sage III is active:- Turns BRV Attack to Blizzard+.- Blizzard+ is a 5-HIT Ice-elemental magic BRV attack.
Passives.Ninja's Secret Teachings: Greatly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Speed while in Ninja stance.
Passives.Multi-Hit Extend: Increases the max uses of Multi-Hit by 1.Tremendously raises its potency.Triggers an HP attack after use.While Ninja II/III is active:- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.While Ninja III is active:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.BRV Attack+ is a 6-HIT melee BRV Attack.

Weapons.Ancient Sword CP: 15: Increases Blizzard Combo's potency and makes it grant 2 stacks of Sage.
Weapons.Sword of an Illusory Youth CP: 15: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Blizzard Combo  and  Multi-Hit
Weapons.Wightslayer CP: 35: Increases Multi-Hit's potency, lowers its Action Delay and makes it grant 2 stacks of Ninja.Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Attack Up for 4 turns.
Weapons.Serpent Sword CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Blade Torrent.
